home.heroTitle: Brewed with heart. Served with soul.

beans.title: 100% Arabica Beans
beans.text: We care about healthy taste and quality — every cup begins with premium 100% Arabica beans

cozy.title: Mindful Area
cozy.text: Slow down, breathe, and enjoy a cup designed to brighten your day.

section1.title: People First, Things Second
section1.subtitle: We commit to provide excellent customer service through friendly team, high quality drinks and postive atmosphere.

section2.title: Mommy's Favorite Drink
section2.subtitle: A long time Khmer dessert, trapae, has now become the most popular smothie drink in Cambodia. This is purly local made.

section3.title: The Best Companion - Coffee with Sticky Rice
section3.subtitle: For coffee lover, you can now taste both our best coffee bean and local made sticky rice.

section4.title: A Stronger You Makes a Stronger Society
section4.subtitle: Let's read, let's improve our knowledge and skills. Reading creates every opportunity of success.

section5.title: We Care about Your Personal Growth
section5.subtitle: This is a coffee for education and we envision a positive change through a cup of coffee.  We do not just run a business, we care about your physical and mental health. We will grow altogether!

banner.title: Ready for your next favorite coffee?
banner.subtitle: Explore our signature drinks and new arrivals.

about.title: Our Story
about.body:
“To rule the universe, you must first rule yourself. To rule yourself, you must be able to rule your own mind. To rule your mind, you must practice mindfulness and clear comprehension.” - Maha Ghosananda 

This is a reason for our small coffee shop. We found it on Friday 1st January, 2021. We envision that a cup of coffee that inspires a positive change in people and the community.
